column1: While Josh Hicks likes to talk I get results. On rural broadband that is why I introduced the Rural Broadband Expansion Act of 2020.  https://t.co/8uQnltJFjV

Just listen to Sheriff Charles Josh Hicks sided with the liberal mob and called all police “systemically racist.”   https://t.co/RImuf0sQtJ

Washington liberals’ handpicked candidate Josh Hicks supports a public option which would put us one step closer toward putting the government fully in charge of healthcare. Josh Hicks' healthcare for all ‘public option’ scheme. That plan will close up to 43 rural hospitals in KY https://t.co/tk0PXLgOyU

During the same time period when I was introducing legislation to hold China accountable Josh Hicks was opening offices to sue doctors and hospitals for "slip and fall" and "medical malpractice." https://t.co/Q7mt4qWG0q
Listen to Dr. Dougherty when Kentucky hospitals were running low on personal protective equipment our office delivered results for Kentucky.  https://t.co/Dgs6F4zenT

Please join me in praying for President Trump and wishing him and the First Lady a healthy recovery. This has been a difficult year for all of us and we pray for the health of all Americans in this fight against COVID-19.

While I have fought to deliver crucial economic relief to small businesses Nancy Pelosi would rather see them go out of business. She only cares about her radical socialist agenda at the expense of our workers. https://t.co/lKHcBATvxt

COVID-19 shut down our economy and small businesses across KY. That's why I worked to implement the Paycheck Protection Program which provided forgivable loans to small businesses saved thousands of jobs kept workers on payroll and gave KY small businesses a crucial lifeline. https://t.co/8XMh1Ud2F8
https://t.co/m8VWGqnzaY
The reason I’m running for Congress is still the same. To restore the American dream. https://t.co/pP7Q3jvw4u

AOC and her fellow socialists are unhinged. Their latest rallying cry is “Defund The Police.” Even as rioters and looters took advantage of peaceful protests our police still protected their communities. We will never allow them to get rid of law and order in our country! https://t.co/s6ziX3Q48B

Tune in to Kentucky Educational Television (KET) tonight at 8pm where I will be discussing our work fighting COVID-19 holding China accountable and reopening the economy to begin the Great American Comeback! https://t.co/DEo56KFqoS
Today marks the 76th anniversary of the D-Day invasions. May we never forget the bravery sacrifice and patriotism of our veterans who triumphed on this day in 1944. https://t.co/C9GUv3yjkR

The May jobs report is great news! Together we built the greatest economy in American history and we’ll do it again. This November we can either choose a path towards prosperity or Pelosi and Biden’s socialist takeover of our economy. https://t.co/qbBjibRfxc

Last week I helped secure almost $98 million for Kentucky to develop purchase administer process & analyze COVID-19 tests as well as to expand other virus initiatives. I’m proud to see Kentucky become a leader in the fight to stop this virus once & safely reopen the economy. https://t.co/3RfT3ppIxk
Honored to have the endorsement of National Right to Life. I will continue to always fight for and defend the lives of the unborn. https://t.co/LSTxChBwvK
